syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Mathematics

learning_objectives.description: use the definition of linear momentum and show understanding of its vector nature
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: For motion in one dimension only.

learning_objectives.description: use conservation of linear momentum to solve problems that may be modelled as the direct impact of two bodies.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Including direct impact of two bodies where the bodies coalesce on impact. Knowledge of impulse and the coefficient of restitution is not required.
